body_html: @trias702 They're supposed to be there actually. They're only template files that need to be processed and copied to the build folder. If you open aten\src\ATen\templates\NativeFunctions.h, you will see that it is not a complete c++ file. The file copying should be consistent across various CUDA versions and various Windows versions. The build works on CI and my PC. So I'm very confused of what's wrong there.

body: @trias702 They're supposed to be there actually. They're only template files that need to be processed and copied to the build folder. If you open `aten\src\ATen\templates\NativeFunctions.h`, you will see that it is not a complete c++ file. The file copying should be consistent across various CUDA versions and various Windows versions. The build works on CI and my PC. So I'm very confused of what's wrong there.
